control

Class BookManagementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.BookManagementController

  • public class BookManagementController
extends java.lang.Object
    BookManagementController is the controller that manage all books, domains, subject and authors.
    Author:
    idanN

      • prepareAddBook

        public Message prepareAddBook(ActionType type,
                              java.lang.String titleBook,
                              java.lang.String authorsId2,
                              java.lang.String keywords,
                              java.lang.String language,
                              java.lang.String subjectsList2,
                              java.lang.String tableOfContent,
                              java.lang.String summary,
                              java.lang.String picture,
                              java.lang.String price)
        Prepare message to add book
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the action that server need to do
        titleBook - title of book
        authorsId2 - ID's of the authors
        keywords - keywords of the book
        language - language of the book
        subjectsList2 - ID's of the subjects
        tableOfContent - table of content of the book
        summary - summary of the book
        picture - picture of the book (base64 encoded)
        price - price of the book
        Returns:
        message

      • prepareEditBook

        public Message prepareEditBook(ActionType type,
                               java.lang.String Sn,
                               java.lang.String titleBook,
                               java.lang.String authorsId2,
                               java.lang.String keywords,
                               java.lang.String language,
                               java.lang.String subjectsList2,
                               java.lang.String tableOfContent,
                               java.lang.String summary,
                               java.lang.String picture,
                               java.lang.String price)
        Prepare message to edit book
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the action that server need to do
        Sn - the SN of the edited book
        titleBook - new title book
        authorsId2 - new ID's of authors
        keywords - new keywords
        language - new language
        subjectsList2 - new subjects
        tableOfContent - new table of content
        summary - new summary
        picture - new picture (base64 encoded)
        price - new price
        Returns:
        message
